sentences.en: a house by the side of the road.
sentences.cn: 路边的一幢房子。

sentences.en: A man stood watching me from the other side of the road.
sentences.cn: 有个男人站在马路的对面看着我。

sentences.en: a stepson who stayed by your side when your own son deserted you.
sentences.cn: 你亲生儿子遗弃你时在你身旁的继子。

sentences.en: Already, both sides are jockeying to belittle the other side.
sentences.cn: 双方已经在使出浑身解数贬低对方了。

sentences.en: Australia's rugby union side enjoyed a record-breaking win over France.
sentences.cn: 澳大利亚的英式橄榄球联盟队创纪录地赢了法国队。

sentences.en: Both groups on either side are just picking off innocent bystanders.
sentences.cn: 对峙双方都只是在瞄准射击无辜的旁观者。

sentences.en: coleslaw on the side.
sentences.cn: 除了酸卷心菜丝外

sentences.en: did some consulting work on the side.
sentences.cn: 做些咨询工作当做副业

sentences.en: Frank sided with David against their mother.
sentences.cn: 弗兰克站在戴维一边反对妈妈。

sentences.en: Fuel is cheaper on the French side of the border.
sentences.cn: 燃料在边境那边的法国要便宜些。

sentences.en: Hannah slipped out through a side exit.
sentences.cn: 汉娜从一个侧门溜了出去。

sentences.en: He is in charge of the civilian side of the UN mission.
sentences.cn: 他在联合国使团中负责平民方面的事务。

sentences.en: He slewed the car against the side of the building.
sentences.cn: 他的车滑到了大楼的一侧，抵住了。

sentences.en: He spun the steering-wheel so that we yawed from side to side.
sentences.cn: 他急速打着舵轮，把我们搞得摇来晃去的。

sentences.en: His friends and family were all on the other side of the world.
sentences.cn: 他的朋友和家人都在地球的另一边。

sentences.en: I do not want to take sides in this matter.
sentences.cn: 在这个问题上，我不想袒护谁。

sentences.en: I shook my head frantically from side to side.
sentences.cn: 我使劲摇头。

sentences.en: I wouldn't like to get on the wrong side of him.
sentences.cn: 我不想激怒他。

sentences.en: Leatherdale was hit resoundingly on the side of the head.
sentences.cn: 莱瑟戴尔头部一侧遭到响亮的一击。

sentences.en: now he had time on his side, Thomas relaxed a little.
sentences.cn: 现在托马斯有足够时间，放松了一点儿。

sentences.en: On either side of the tracks the ground fell away sharply.
sentences.cn: 跑道两侧都是很陡的斜坡。

sentences.en: On the far side of the street, two boys were playing marbles.
sentences.cn: 在街道的那一边，两个男孩在玩弹子游戏。

sentences.en: Tamsin materialized at her side, notebook at the ready.
sentences.cn: 塔姆辛从她身旁冒了出来，且备好了笔记本。

sentences.en: the finest coffee this side of Brazil.
sentences.cn: 可与巴西咖啡媲美的绝好咖啡。

sentences.en: The flask is completely watertight, even when laid on its side.
sentences.cn: 即使平放，这个真空水杯也是滴水不漏。

sentences.en: the fleet stretched four miles from side to side.
sentences.cn: 这支舰队横跨四海里。

sentences.en: The home side rubbed in their superiority with a further goal.
sentences.cn: 主队再进一球从而奠定了优势。

sentences.en: The restaurant was empty apart from another couple on the far side of the room (= the area that is furthest away from you ) .
sentences.cn: 饭店里空空的，只有最那边还有一对夫妇。

sentences.en: The side tracks off the tarred road were rutted and uneven.
sentences.cn: 柏油路面两边的辅道上布满车辙，凹凸不平。

sentences.en: there were shouts now from all sides.
sentences.cn: 现在到处都是叫喊声。

sentences.en: these boots are a bit on the tight side.
sentences.cn: 这些靴子略微紧了一点。

sentences.en: these boots are a bit on the tight side.
sentences.cn: 这些靴子略微紧了一点。

sentences.en: this side of midnight.
sentences.cn: 在午夜之前。

sentences.en: To the side of the large star is a smaller star.
sentences.cn: 大星星旁边是一颗小一点的星星。

sentences.en: You'll need to get on the right side of Carmela.
sentences.cn: 你得讨卡梅拉的欢心。

words.tran_cn: 支持（side的现在分词）；给…装上侧面；收拾，整理
次级的,偶发的,插句的,不重要的

phrases.tran_cn: 与…相比；在…旁边；在……的边上
在某人身边（尤指给某人安慰或精神支持）

phrases.phrase: have something on one's side (或 something is on on

phrases.tran_cn: (英)使同事（或朋友）失望（或难堪）
颇，有点儿，相当（用于修饰形容词）
兼职作为副业：除了主要的职业或活动外

phrases.phrase: on/from every side (或 on/from all sides)

phrases.tran_cn: adv. 与...并肩（与...并排；与...同时）

phrases.phrase: take (或 draw) someone to/on one side
phrases.tran_cn: 私下说（尤指就某事建议或警告某人）
（在争端、冲突或比赛中）支持一方，袒护；反对另一方
(非正式)[用于最高级短语中]接近（典范，榜样）

trans.tran_en: in or on the side of something
one of the two areas that are on the left or the right of an imaginary line, or on the left or the right of a border, wall, river etc
to support or argue against a person or group in a quarrel, fight etc
